title: Writing in Standard Form
text: To put the parabola in standard form, we can simply multiply both sides by $$8$$ to get $$8x=y^2$$
speech: To put the parabola in standard form, we can simply multiply both sides by , 8  to get  8 x, is equal to y squared

title: Finding The Characteristics
text: From the equation, we know that the vertex is $$(0,0)$$ and that $$p=2$$. This means that the focus is $$(2,0)$$ and the directrix is $$x=-2$$
